node.title: National park to be renamed over links to 'blackbirding'
node.alt: A drone image shows Green Cape Lighthouse and Ben Boyd National Park
node.description: The name of a controversial historical figure will be removed from a national park on the NSW far south coast due to links to slavery.
node.content:
["A controversial national park on New South Wales' far south coast is to be renamed over links to slavery.", "Ben Boyd National Park, south of Eden, is named after a\u00a0Scottish colonialist from the 19th century, Benjamin Boyd.", "The name of the park has long sparked controversy, particularly among the local indigenous community, who have called for it to be changed due to\u00a0Boyd's links to 'blackbirding.'", "Boyd is considered Australia's first 'blackbirder', the name given to operators who shipped South Sea Islanders to the colonies and paid minimal wages to evade anti-slavery laws.", "Environment Minister Matt Kean said the decision to change the park's name was long overdue.", "\"It is time to acknowledge the real history of Ben Boyd and remove his name from the national park,\"\u00a0Mr Kean said.", "", "
Local Indigenous elders and community memebrs have long called for the Ben Boyd National Park to be renamed.(Supplied: Flying Parrot)
", "The decision follows an extensive independent historical review of\u00a0Boyd's activities by Dr Mark Dunn.", "Dr Dunn's report confirmed\u00a0Boyd's involvement with blackbirding.", "The park will be renamed in the language of traditional custodians, which the state government said will better reflect the area's rich cultural heritage.", "Community consultation with local Aboriginal elders and community members will begin within the next few weeks\u00a0to identify what the park will now be called."]
